Colors Graphics Gradients Borders Typography Icons Buttons Forms

This is a gradient divider. It's fixed height and gradient colors. Not to be used in any other way! No color switching, nor gradient direction changes. Height is always fixed to 3px.

NB: Not all colors could be mixed.

Horizontal Gardient variants

Gradients are split between two colors at 50%. Only primary colors should be used. No more than two colors can be applied.

.exp-gradient-x-dark-light-blue
.exp-gradient-x-violet-purple
.exp-gradient-x-violet-pink
.exp-gradient-x-purple-pink
.exp-gradient-x-violet-blue
.exp-gradient-x-purple-blue
.exp-gradient-x-light-dark-blue
.exp-gradient-x-purple-violet
.exp-gradient-x-pink-violet
.exp-gradient-x-pink-purple
.exp-gradient-x-blue-violet
.exp-gradient-x-blue-purple

Vertical Gardient variants

.exp-gradient-y-dark-light-blue
.exp-gradient-y-violet-purple
.exp-gradient-y-violet-pink
.exp-gradient-y-purple-pink
.exp-gradient-y-violet-blue
.exp-gradient-y-purple-blue
.exp-gradient-y-light-dark-blue
.exp-gradient-y-purple-violet
.exp-gradient-y-pink-violet
.exp-gradient-y-pink-purple
.exp-gradient-y-blue-violet
.exp-gradient-y-blue-purple

NB: Not all angles are applicabe.
